name: Aloor
content:
Aloor was a male Ithorian who worked as a doctor during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
In 3 ABY, Aloor lived on the planet Dalicron-4 in the Outer Rim. He owned a surgery called Doc Aloor in Dalia, the main settlement on Dalicron-4. When the child Zanner was attacked by Verlen, he was taken to Aloor. The Ithorian took him into his surgery, and after examining the child, he pronounced that he would live.
